task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
Hello Akash, 

Amazing work ! 
This task couldn't have been done any better. I am really impressed by your creativity and the amount of effort you have put in. 

Thank you for your contribution, we really appreciate it. : )
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App
Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
After days of building the APK, setting up software, recording, re-recording, editing, exporting, and finally re-editing and re-exporting, I present to you my Mifos X Android Client Demonstration video! 
It is available on Google Drive here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1KYgmDLJ1iG3GPlYVzzZsnXueEirwsstL

Please feel free to download the video and publish it (YouTube, website, etc.) 
Also let me know if there are any changes I should make.
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
Hello Akash, 

Glad to know that you managed to build the app from source, all by yourself. I am quite impressed. 

Regarding the setup instructions, I don't have any objections against it. I'll create a task for the same and then you can work on that too. 

If you need any assistance, please let me know. : )
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
Thank you Abhilash, I have enabled "Show Touches" in developer options. I just finished successfully building the APK from source after running in to a lot of issues. 

After I complete this task, I'll send an updated Android setup instructions for the latest version of Android Studio and Gradle, if that's OK with you.
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text: While preparing the screen-cast, please make sure to enable "visual feedback for taps". This is can be found in the Developer Options of your Android Device. : )
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
Also, I hope that you have built the android app from source, available in the  GitHub repository; as the app present in Google Play Store currently doesn't have all the latest additions made to the app.

Please let me know, if you need any help. : )
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text:
Hello Akash,

Explaining the installation procedure won't be necessary. We are assuming that the user already has the app installed and just wants to get familiar with the features of the app.  

If you need any further assistance, please let me know, I'll be glad to help. : )
task_definition_name: Create a screencast to demonstrate the use of Android Field Officer App

text: Should I also explain how to install application in the video?
